704030f-a.text:
Driggs Ave., west side, between South 3rd and 4th Streets; a view of the Novelty Theatre. The steeple of the South 3rd Street Presbyterian Church is seen at the right. On the maps of 1908, a frame 3-story building occupied the vacant space to the left of the theatre.
1917.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

702311f-a.text:
South 3rd Street, north side, east from Driggs Ave., showing Public
School No. 50.
August 9, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
